{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Gateway |model=7001 AP |revision=A1 |upc=827103021844 |fcc_date=03/30/2004 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |type=access point |fcc_id=RRK2003060017-1,RRK2003060017-2,RRK2003060017-3 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP422 |cpu1_cspeed=266 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F640J3C-120 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W981216DH-75 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, populated,, J1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, (115200,8,N,1),, JP1 |wi1_module=Alpha Networks WMP-A13V |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5213 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5112 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=a |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_module=Alpha Networks WMP-G02V |wi2_module_if=Mini PCI |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR5213 |wi2_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip2_model=AR2112A |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=IC+ |eth_chip2_model=IP101 |eth_chip3_brand=IC+ |eth_chip3_model=IP101 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=3.3V Zero Delay Buffer;Cypress;CY2305;;1;,,, DC/DC Switching Regulator;ATC;AP34063;;1;,,, Hex Inverter;Texas Instruments;SN74AHC04;;1;,,, Low Frequency EMI Reduction IC;ON Semi;P2010A;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AO4403;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AO4801;;1;,,, 40V N-Channel MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4840DY;;1;,,, 150V N-Channel MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4848DY;;1;,,, 4 Pin General Purpose Photocoupler;Sharp;PC817;;2;,,, Economy Primary Side Controller;Texas Instruments;UCC3809-2;;1; |stock_boot=RedBoot;v1.92; |stock_os=Linux;2.4.20; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid=Gateway 7001 AP Internal Network,Gateway 7001 AP Guest Network |default_ssid_regex=^Gateway 7001 AP Internal Network$,,,^Gateway 7001 AP Guest Network$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:E0:B8 |oui_eth=00:00:83 }} {{TagLine|802.11A+G Wireless Access Point}} :[http://support.gateway.com/s/Manuals/servers/8510029.pdf User guide] *"8WMPG02..0A1" is silkscreened on the 2.4GHz board. *"8WMPA13..2A1" is silkscreened on the 5GHz board. Per WiGLE and the manual, the default SSIDs are probably:
''Gateway 7001 AP Internal Network'' and ''Gateway 7001 AP Guest Network''. :The OUI for these SSIDs is 00:E0:B8.
